鮣字的基本解释

鮣
yìn
〔鮣鱼〕体长，呈圆筒形。口大，鳞细，头扁平。头顶上有一长椭圆形的、具软骨质横褶的吸盘，常吸附于大鱼或船底。

鮣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yìn］
［《廣韻》於刃切，去震，影。］
鱼名。体细长，略呈圆柱形，黑褐色，有两条白色纵纹，鳞小而圆。口大，下颌突出。头及身体前端背部扁平。头顶有吸盘，常以此吸附于其他大鱼体下或船底而移行远方。生活于海洋。

鮣字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【魚字部】　鮣； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页1469第11
【廣韻】於刃切【集韻】伊刃切，?音印。魚名，身上如印。【類篇】鮣鱗，魚名。如篆，一曰首象印。【左思·吳都賦】鮣龜鱕䱜。【註】鮣魚長三尺，無鱗，身中正，四方如印。扶南俗云：諸大魚欲死者，鮣魚皆先封之。

鮣字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鮣字的起名意思

暂无。

Obituary
Basic explanation of words
Obituary
yìn
[Obituary] The body is long and cylindrical. The mouth is large, the scales are thin, and the head is flat. There is a long oval suction cup with cartilaginous folds on the top of the head, which is often attached to big fish or the bottom of a boat.
Obituary
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yìn］
["Guang Yun" cuts on the blade, removes the shock, and shadows. ]
The name of the fish. The body is slender, slightly cylindrical, dark brown, with two white vertical stripes, and the scales are small and round. The mouth is large and the lower jaw is prominent. The head and the front of the body are flat on the back. There is a suction cup on the top of the head, which is often used to adsorb under the body of other big fish or the bottom of the boat and move far away. Live in the ocean.
Obituary
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Fish Character Department] 　鮣; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 1469 Page 11
[Guang Yun] Yu Blade Cut [Ji Yun] Yi Blade Cut,? Yin Yin. The name of the fish is like a seal on the body. 【Classes】Fish scales, fish names. Like the seal, the first image is the first image. [Zuo Si·Fu of Wu Du] 鱣鱕䱜. [Note] The obituaries are three feet long, have no scales, are centered and square like a seal. Funan vulgar cloud: All the big fish who want to die, the obituaries will be sealed first.
